item.title: Report E-2024100299
item.description:
Report E-2024100299

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-11T09:22:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-18
  • City: DECATUR
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0950ET, Scott Shelton with XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release located at terminal NDE. It was reported that approximately 1 quart of Polymac 220-2880 released from (1) 55-gallon due to forklift puncture. The release impacted the trailer floor. Terminal personnel already flipped the drum upside down to stop the release and it is currently sitting on the dock. 218755-1 95-gallon DF, contains (1) 55-gallon metal drum, spent oil dri, and PPE.
